Plot: The story of George Jung, the man who established the American cocaine market in the 1970s.
Title: Blow
Writer: Bruce Porter (book), David McKenna (screenplay), Nick Cassavetes (screenplay)
Actors: Johnny Depp, Penélope Cruz, Franka Potente, Rachel Griffiths
tomatoConsensus: With elements that seem borrowed from movies like Goodfellas and Boogie Nights, Blow is pretty much been-there-done-that despite another excellent performance from Johnny Depp. It, also, becomes too sentimental at the end.
